titleStmt.title: Description of University of Pennsylvania Ms. Codex 1268: Manuale Bernardi Canal notarii de Rippis

msIdentifier.repository: Kislak Center for Special Collections, Rare Books and Manuscripts

msContents.summary: Ledger book of notarial entries about sales, between the years 1351 and 1352, from Bernardo Canal of Ripas, Spain. Most entries feature records of sale, possibly about property. Many of the entries have been crossed out, but are still legible. One of the notes contains annotations and some arithmetical notes, and is dated 1533 in a later hand. The other note contains two notarial statements in a contemporary hand.

msItem.title: Manuale Bernardi Canal notarii de Rippis

supportDesc.extent: 81 leaves : 225 x 140 mm. bound to 240 x 150 mm. +

collation.p: Paper, 81; [1-81]; 1²⁴ 2¹⁶ 3⁸ 4⁴ 5⁸ 6⁴ 7⁵ 8³ 9⁹; modern foliation in pencil, lower right recto.

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Written in a Gothic cursive script.

origin.p: Written in Catalonia, from 1351 (upper cover) to 1352 (f. 81v).

history.provenance: Sold by Laurence Witten (New Haven, Conn.), 1960.
